ISSUE.TITLE: Layout admin does not include the inline scripts
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.2.0 Steps to reproduce the problem: Create a plugin that includes a component for example in the AdminWidgetZone OrderDetailsBlock. In the view of the component add an inline script like: ``` <script asp-location="Footer"> alert('hurray!'); </script> ``` The script is not added to the page because inline scripts are not added in the admin layout.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5171 Fixed inline edit issue "The value is not valid for seconds"

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4930 Added a possibility to include inline scripts in admin layout using tag helper
